title: Mellos Static Line Trace
description: This plugin uses a cache strategy, statically uses ray detection to detect the visible distance in all directions
longDescription: This plugin uses a cache strategy, statically uses ray detection to detect the visible distance in all directions, and efficiently queries through table lookup at runtime. It provides an optimized solution for scenarios requiring frequent visibility checks, ensuring minimal performance impact. The plugin is especially useful in large-scale environments where dynamic computation would be too resource-intensive.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Cache ray detection results and facilitate query

Code Modules:

  •  MellosStaticLineTrace - Runtime

Number of Blueprints: 1

Number of C++ Classes: 3

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64 Win32

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64 Win32

Documentation: https://fan-gondola-7a6.notion.site/Mellos-Static-Line-Trace-29db1f05ecad497899018f2dc2683bc7?pvs=4

Example Project: https://github.com/GuangminJu/StaticLineTraceDemo.git
